maqras.text: Apane palanahara de nama di pavitarata da varanana karo, jihara sabha tom sresata hai
Jisa ne paida kita phira savari'a
Jisa ne (samajha diti) thahira'i'a ate phira raha vikha'i'a
Jisa ne ghaha (cara) paida kita
Phira usa nu kale raga da kura bana dita
Asim tuhanu parhavange, phira tusim nahim bhuloge
Paratu jo alaha cahe, uha janada hai, `gujhi'am vi ate pragata vi
Ate asim tuhanu saukhe raha te lai calange
Tam sikhi'a devem, jekara sikhi'a labha deve
Uha bada upadesa savikara karega jihara darada hai
Uha jihara abhaga hovega, usa tom muha morega
Uha vadi aga vica digega
Uha na usa vica marega ate nam ji'unda rahega
Uha safala ho'i'a jisa ne apane apa nu pavitara kita
Ate apane raba da nama li'a, phira namaza parhi
Sagom tusim dhuni'avi jivana nu ahami'ata dide ho
Ate praloka bihatara hai ate satha'i hai
Iha pahile sahifi'am (gratham? Vica vi hai)
Musa ate ibarahima de sahifi'am vica
Ki tuhanu usa cha jana vali di sucana pahuci hai
Kujha cihare usa dina be'izata honage
Sakhata mihanata karana vale thake ho'e
Uha bharakadi ho'i aga vica painage
Ubalade ho'e jharani'a vicom pani pila'i'a javega
Unham la'i kadi'am vale jhara tom binam hora ko'i bhojana nahim hovega
Jihara na razi karega ate na bhukha mita'ega
Kujha cihare usa dina khusa honage
Apani kama'i te khusa honage
Uce bagam vica
Uha unham vica ko'i bekara gala nahim sunanage
Usa vica vagade ho'e jharane honage
Usa vica uce takhata viche ho'e honage
Ate abakhore (pi'ale) sahamane rakhe honage
Ate gade (sirahane) pakati'am vicaî€¼ lage (honage) ho'e
Ate hareka disa vica pa'e ho'e galice
Ki iha loka utha nu nahim vekhade ki kivem paida kita gi'a hai
Ate akasa nu ki iha kivem uca kita gi'a hai
Ate paharam nu vi ki uha kisa taram kharhe kite ga'e hana
Ate dharati nu, ki uha kisa tar'ham vicha'i ga'i hai
So tusim yada kara devo, tusim sirapha yada kara'una vale ho
Tusi' unham te daroga nahim
Paratu jisa ne muha mori'a ate inakara kita
Tam alaha usa nu vada dada devega
Sade vala hi unham di vapasi hai
Phira sade zime hai, unham va hisaba laina hai
Fajara (amrita vela) di sahu hai
Ate dasa ratam di
Ate jisata ate tanka di
Ate rata di jadom uha jana lage
Ki'um, isa vica tam budhimanam la'i kafi pramana hana
Tusim nahim dekhi'a? Tuhade raba ne ada (kauma-e-ada) de nala ki kita
Khabhi'am vale irama (vade kadam vale) de nala
Jinham varagi ko'i kauma desam vica paida nahim kiti ga'i
Ate samuda de nala, jinham ne (kara di'am) ghati'am vica catanam tarasi'am (ate ghara bana'e)
Ate mekham vale phira'auna de nala
Jinham ne desam vica bagavata kiti
Phira unham vica bahuta phasada faila'i'a
Tam tuhade raba ne unham te saza da kora varasa'i'a
Besaka tuhada raba ghata vica hai
So manukha da mamala iha hai ki jadom usa da raba usa da imatihana lainda hai ate usa nu izata ate ni'amata bakhasada hai, tam uha akhada hai ki mere raba ne mainu sanamana dita hai
Ate jadom uha usa da imatihana lainda hai ate usa da rizaka taga kara dida hai. Tam uha akhada hai ki mere raba ne mainu be-izata kara dita
Kade vi nahim, sagom' tusim anatham da sanamana nahim karade
Ate na tusi' misakina (niradhana) nu bhojana khila'una la'i ika duje nu prerita karade ho
Ate tusim virasata (vica mili daulata) nu ikatha karake kha jande ho
Ate tusim apani ja'idada nala bahuta pi'ara karade ho
Kade vi nahim, jadom dharati nu tora ke reza-reza (kana) kara dita javega
Ate tuhada raba avega (te raga vikhavega), te farisate kataram banha ke a a'unage
Ate usa dina naraka hazira kara diti javegi. Usa dina manukha nu samajha avegi, para usa vele samajhana da mauka kithe
uha akhega ki kasa! Maim apane jivana vica kujha age bhejada
So usa dina na tam alaha de barabara kau'i saza devega
Ate na usa de banhana vanga ko'i banha sakega
He satusata atama
cala apane raba vala. Tu usa tom khusa ate uha tere tom khusa
So mere badi'am vica samila ho
Ate meri janata vica dakhila ho
